content.description:
The Gallic Mercury

1 Deum maxime Mercurium colunt. Huius sunt

plurima simulacra:simulacrum, -i, n.: image; statue hunc omnium inventorem

artium ferunt, hunc viarum atque itinerum

ducem, hunc ad quaestusquaestus, -us, m.: acquisition pecuniae

5 mercaturasquemercatura, -ae, f.: trade, transaction, commerce habere vim maximam arbitrantur.
content.question: During Republican times, which group of Romans was restricted by law from engaging in commerce?

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
